name: Dirt Soul
description: Here you have to go through severe tests with fire and sword. Can you justify all your actions in the past? I think this game is one of the hardest... You don't have to play it... But, if you want, here's the controls: the right/left and down/up arrows will serve as excellent motion generators for your soul. Don't forget that you can climb walls. The game will be finalized if you provide support, but I doubt that there will be support... Thank you in advance for reading this and noticing!
